ygData.subject: RE: [EQ_Tinkering] new tinkering components
ygData.msgSnippet: Unless they fixed the Deluxe tool boxes (to give them 10-slots) I don t think any of the armor pieces can be made yet.  Trials in a forge got the DNC result.
ygData.messageBody:
Unless they fixed the Deluxe tool boxes (to give them 10-slots) I don't
think any of the armor pieces can be made yet. Trials in a forge got the
DNC result.

Leagnomo

-----Original Message-----
From: Aranathes Bonethrower [mailto:aranathes@...]
Sent: Wednesday, December 13, 2000 1:25 PM
To: EQ_Tinkering@egroups.com
Subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] new tinkering components


Holgresh have their own faction, and the corrupted spawns are somewhat rare,
and defiently big and bad. They still con kos to me, so I think that they
just hate everyone. Gonna attempt some of the armor pieces tonight, as I
have three sets of small fine steel sitting in the bank now. If successful,
I will post immediately. =)

Still haven't gotten haze panther eyes, or blocks of living granite,
although I know that they too drop in wakening lands now.

Ghirardelli
E'ci
